CustomField.description: Determines whether Logger will insert a Logged Exception every time you call the Log method (if Flushable is false), or if you'd like to en-queue the Logged Exceptions to conserve DML calls (Flushable = true).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines whether Logger will insert a Logged Exception every time you call the Log method (if Flushable is false), or if you'd like to en-queue the Logged Exceptions to conserve DML calls (Flushable = true).
CustomField.label: Flushable
